mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CATEGORYTB SELECT #{licensenumber}, #{category} FROM DUAL WHERE EXISTS( SELECT CATEGORY FROM CATEGORYINFOTB WHERE CATEGORY=#{category})
INSERT INTO FACILITYTB SELECT #{licensenumber}, #{category} FROM DUAL WHERE EXISTS( SELECT FACILITY FROM FACILITYINFOTB WHERE FACILITY=#{category})
mapper.select: SELECT contact,enterprisedetailtb.licensenumber as licensenumber,address,weekend,weekday,domain,storename,parking,cp_entnum ,private,frontimg,realpath, (select count(licensenumber) from replytb where replytb.licensenumber=ENTERPRISEDETAILTB.licensenumber)as rownum, (select count(licensenumber) from like_badoomtb where ENTERPRISEDETAILTB.licensenumber=like_badoomtb.licensenumber and like_badoomcode='badoom') as badoomnum, (select count(like_badoomtb.email) from like_badoomtb where ENTERPRISEDETAILTB.licensenumber=like_badoomtb.licensenumber and like_badoomtb.email=#{email} and like_badoomcode='badoom') as badoom, (select count(licensenumber) from like_badoomtb where ENTERPRISEDETAILTB .licensenumber=like_badoomtb.licensenumber and like_badoomcode='like') as likenum, (select count(like_badoomtb.email) from like_badoomtb where ENTERPRISEDETAILTB .licensenumber=like_badoomtb.licensenumber and like_badoomtb.email=#{email} and like_badoomcode='like')as likee FROM ENTERPRISEDETAILTB , ENTIMGTB , CATEGORYTB where ENTERPRISEDETAILTB.LICENSENUMBER=CATEGORYTB.LICENSENUMBER AND ENTIMGTB.LICENSENUMBER=ENTERPRISEDETAILTB.LICENSENUMBER AND ENTERPRISEDETAILTB.PRIVATE='N' group by contact,enterprisedetailtb.licensenumber ,address,weekend,weekday,domain,storename,parking,cp_entnum ,private,frontimg,realpath
